TEXT.TITLE: DEERFIELD FEDERAL SAVINGS <DEER.O> 4TH QTR NET
TEXT.BODY: Period ended Sept 30 Shr 73 cts Net 845,000 vs 454,000 Year Shr 2.45 dlrs Net 2,819,000 vs 2,007,000 Note: Company went public March 31, 1987. Full name is Deerfield Federal Savings and Loan Association Reuter
